scripts.dev: rm -rf apidocjs-template-dark-Slate-Inspiration- && git clone https://github.com/jodacame/apidocjs-template-dark-Slate-Inspiration-.git && apidoc -i lib -o build -t apidocjs-template-dark-Slate-Inspiration-/template && node server.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf apidocjs-template-dark-Slate-Inspiration- && git clone https://github.com/jodacame/apidocjs-template-dark-Slate-Inspiration-.git && apidoc -i lib -o build -t apidocjs-template-dark-Slate-Inspiration-/template && webpack --mode development
